00002  *  maven Programming Language
00003  *  Created by Elliot Chance <elliot@chancemedia.com>.

00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 
00008 bool isOperatorPart(string type) {
00009         if(type == "") return false;
00010         
00011         // rather than list all of the operators in every combination
00012         // we will asume anythign thats not part of an entity name is an operator
00013         // this will also help when custom operator overloading comes along.
00014         if(isalnum(type[0]) || type[0] == '_' || type[0] == ' ')
00015                 return false;
00016         
00017         // the object operator is not seen as an offical operator becuase it cant be overloaded
00018         // and its part of bare numbers and some entities
00019         if(type[0] == '.')
00020                 return false;
00021         if(type[0] == ',')
00022                 return false;
00023         
00024         // brackets are not consider to be operators and have to be tested for separatly
00025         // depending on the situation
00026         if(type[0] == '(' || type[0] == ')')
00027                 return false;
00028         
00029         // must be an operator...
00030         return true;
00031 }
